thread.title: Rocky Mountain National Park sets visitor record (again) in 2016
thread.title_full: Rocky Mountain National Park sets visitor record (again) in 2016

author: Tom McGhee
title: Rocky Mountain National Park sets visitor record (again) in 2016
text: Southern Colorado county declares disaster because of massive snow drifts, high winds January 24, 2017, 3:50 pm A county in southern Colorado declared a disaster Tuesday because of heavy snow and strong winds which were combining to create dangerous conditions. Dean of Colorado burro racing Curtis Imrie dies during National Western donkey show January 24, 2017, 3:38 pm Curtis, Imrie, considered one of the deans of Colorado burro racing, died Saturday as he prepared to show a donkey at the National Western Stock Show. He was 70. Achieving accredited status just the beginning for surging Englewood Schools, educators hope January 24, 2017, 2:16 pm Previously among the stateâ€™s lowest performing districts, Englewood Schools earned accredited status this year. Officials credit engaged kids and new facilities for the turnaround. Boulder struggles to manage human waste, trash along Boulder Creek January 24, 2017, 2:14 pm After businesses and public facilities close, the homeless who sleep in hidden spots along Boulder Creek are opting in certain cases to relieve themselves outdoors, to the chagrin of public officials and many visitors to the area.
